description: Easily create components by right-clicking on a folder. Using handlebars templates.
enableTemplateExtendParams: Enable extended parameters to search for the mapping.json file within the .vue-typescript-files directory of the current workspace.
toggleComponentButton: Toggle visibility of the 'Add Component' button
toggleVuexModuleButton: Toggle visibility of the 'Add Vuex Submodule' button
toggleGlobalDeclareButton: Toggle visibility of the 'Add Global Declaration' button
toggleDirectiveButton: Toggle visibility of the 'Add Directive' button
toggleBasicClassButton: Toggle visibility of the 'Add Base Class' button
toggleInterfaceButton: Toggle visibility of the 'Add Interface' button
toggleEnumButton: Toggle visibility of the 'Add Enum Class' button
componentPrefix: Define a prefix for component names (does not change filenames, only class names in the code)
componentSuffix: Define a suffix for component names (does not change filenames, only class names in the code)
spotStyleNameClassCreation: Use a dot (.) to separate class names during creation; e.g., 'a.b' will create the class name 'AB' (only supports single separation)
